sentences.en: a proposal whereby EU citizens would be allowed to reside anywhere in the EU
sentences.cn: 允许欧盟公民在欧盟任何地方居住的一项提议

sentences.en: Defence to a criminal charge whereby the accused state he act involuntarily.
sentences.cn: 对刑事指控的一种抗辩,被告在抗辩时说他的行为是非自愿的.

sentences.en: He devised a plan whereby they might get rich.
sentences.cn: 他设想出他们可以藉此致富的计画.

sentences.en: He knew the finger alphabet, whereby the deaf and dumb communicate.
sentences.cn: 他懂得聋哑人交流用的“盲文”.

sentences.en: Love is the chain whereby to bind a child to his parents.
sentences.cn: 爱是连结子女与父母的链子.

sentences.en: Our study uncovers a fundamental relationship whereby cell cycle position regulates growth.
sentences.cn: 这个研究揭示了细胞周期所处的时相调控细胞生长.

sentences.en: Show me the merit whereby you have charmed these persons, and I also will esteem you.
sentences.cn: 拿给我看你博得这些人醉心的优点吧, 我也会同样地看重你的.

sentences.en: The phenomenon whereby a viscous substance solidifies under pressure.
sentences.cn: 膨胀凝固性一种粘性物质在压力下变成凝固的现象.

sentences.en: They voted to accept a deal whereby the union will receive nearly three-quarters of a million pounds from the International Miners Organisation.
sentences.cn: 他们表决同意了一项协议，根据这一协议工会将从国际矿工组织得到近75万英镑。

sentences.en: This is a technique whereby land is scraped from above in order to fined coal.
sentences.cn: 这是削去表面土层来获取煤的一种开采技术.

sentences.en: This is the means whereby we ( have ) worked out the answer to that problem.
sentences.cn: ( 这就是我们借以解决这难题的方法. )

sentences.en: We need this system whereby a new plan may arise.
sentences.cn: 我们需要这种可能借以产生新计划的制度。

sentences.en: We need to devise some sort of system whereby people can liaise with each other.
sentences.cn: 我们须想出一套方法，凭此大家能够互相联络。

sentences.en: Whereby I saw that he was angry.
sentences.cn: 由那一点我看出他生气了.
我怎么才能知道这个 呢 ?
我们靠什么认出她 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: by means of which or according to which
